description:
Misha Collins is taking a stab a directing for the first time on an upcoming episode of "Supernatural," and from the looks of things, his new position is as easy as pie.Misha Collins将会作为导演指导《邪恶力量》接下来的某一集，从照片上看来，他的新工作对他来说真是小菜一碟。

His co-star Jared Padalecki pied him the face, and Jensen Ackles was in on it. We knew these guys liked to mess around on set, and now there's video proof, thanks to Collins tweeting out a link to the video.我们可以看到，演员Jared Padalecki把一个派砸到了他脸上，而另一个演员Jensen Ackles正在他脸上舔着。我们一直都知道这三个大男人在片场肯定玩得很疯，不过感谢Collins的视频，现在有视频为证了。

"As a first-time director, I gotta say, I'm lucky to have guys like Jensen & @jarpad watching out for me!" Collins writes. Collins在Twitter上说，“第一次当导演，不得不说我很幸运，能有Jensen和@jarpad这样的好伙伴陪着我。

title: 美剧《邪恶力量》片场：贵圈真乱
